TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi TextFieldParser extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供用於剖析結構化文字檔的方法和屬性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties for parsing structured text files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `TextFieldParser`物件提供的方法和屬性的剖析結構化文字檔案。The `TextFieldParser` object provides methods and properties for parsing structured text files. 剖析的文字檔案`TextFieldParser`類似文字檔案，來反覆查看時`ReadFields`擷取的文字欄位的方法是類似分割字串。Parsing a text file with the `TextFieldParser` is similar to iterating over a text file, while the `ReadFields` method to extract fields of text is similar to splitting the strings. `TextFieldParser`可以剖析兩種檔案類型： 分隔或固定寬度。The `TextFieldParser` can parse two types of files: delimited or fixed-width. 某些屬性，例如`Delimiters`和`HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes`才有意義時使用分隔的檔案，而`FieldWidths`屬性使用固定寬度的檔案時，才有意義。Some properties, such as `Delimiters` and `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes` are meaningful only when working with delimited files, while the `FieldWidths` property is meaningful only when working with fixed-width files. 下表列出包含工作的範例`Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser`物件。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `Microsoft.VisualBasic.FileIO.TextFieldParser` object. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從分隔的文字檔讀取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：從逗號分隔文字檔讀取How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |從固定寬度的文字檔讀取Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：從固定寬度的文字檔讀取How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| |從以多種格式的文字檔讀取Read from a text file with multiple formats|[如何：以多種格式從文字檔讀取How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會剖析 tab 鍵分隔的文字檔，透過`Bigfile`。This example parses through a tab-delimited text file, `Bigfile`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#17)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立新`TextFieldParser`剖析檔案或資料流，物件由`stream`參數。Creates a new `TextFieldParser` object to parse the file or stream that is represented by the `stream` parameter. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and could cause an exception to be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public TextFieldParser (System.IO.Stream stream, System.Text.Encoding defaultEncoding, bool detectEncoding);

public: TextFieldParser(System::IO::Stream ^ stream, System::Text::Encoding ^ defaultEncoding, bool detectEncoding);

span.span: The stream to be parsed.

param.name: defaultEncoding
param.span: 如果編碼不是從檔案中決定，則為要使用的字元編碼。

span.span: The character encoding to use if encoding is not determined from file.
Default is .

param.name: detectEncoding
param.span: 表示是否在檔案開頭尋找位元組順序標記。

span.span: Indicates whether to look for byte order marks at the beginning of the file.
Default is .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立新`TextFieldParser`剖析檔案或資料流，物件由`stream`參數。Creates a new `TextFieldParser` object to parse the file or stream that is represented by the `stream` parameter. 如果`detectEncoding`參數是`True`，這個建構函式會嘗試偵測藉由查看前三個位元組，檔案或資料流的編碼方式。If the `detectEncoding` parameter is `True`, this constructor attempts to detect the encoding by looking at the first three bytes of the file or stream. 會自動辨識 utf-8、 由小到大 Unicode 和 big endian Unicode 文字如果檔案開始是透過適當的位元組順序標記。It automatically recognizes UTF-8, little-endian Unicode, and big-endian Unicode text if the file starts with the appropriate byte-order marks. 否則，指定編碼的`defaultEncoding`用。Otherwise, the encoding specified by `defaultEncoding` is used. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and could cause an exception to be thrown.

span.span: or is .
cannot be read from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立新`TextFieldParser`剖析檔案或資料流，物件由`stream`參數。Creates a new `TextFieldParser` object to parse the file or stream that is represented by the `stream` parameter. 如果`detectEncoding`參數是`True`，這個建構函式會嘗試偵測藉由查看前三個位元組，檔案或資料流的編碼方式。If the `detectEncoding` parameter is `True`, this constructor attempts to detect the encoding by looking at the first three bytes of the file or stream. 會自動辨識 utf-8、 由小到大 Unicode 和 big endian Unicode 文字如果檔案開始是透過適當的位元組順序標記。It automatically recognizes UTF-8, little-endian Unicode, and big-endian Unicode text if the file starts with the appropriate byte-order marks. 否則，指定編碼的`defaultEncoding`用。Otherwise, the encoding specified by `defaultEncoding` is used. > [!CAUTION] > 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable and could cause an exception to be thrown.

summary.span: 關閉目前的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Examples 這個範例會關閉`TextFieldParser.FileReader`。This example closes the `TextFieldParser.FileReader`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ CommentTokens { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 定義註解語彙基元 (Token)。

span.span: Defines comment tokens.

summary.span: 註解語彙基元是一個字串，當置於一行的開頭時，表示該行為註解，剖析器 (Parser) 應當忽略。

span.span: A comment token is a string that, when placed at the beginning of a line, indicates that the line is a comment and should be ignored by the parser.

value.span: 字串陣列，其中包含 物件的所有註解語彙基元。

span.span: A string array that contains all of the comment tokens for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 長度為零的註解語彙基元會被忽略。Zero-length comment tokens are ignored. ## Examples 這個範例會指定針對`TextFieldParser`，`FileReader`應該忽略開頭與單引號 （'）。This example specifies that for the `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader` lines beginning with a single quotation mark (') should be ignored. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

exception.span: 註解語彙基元包含空白字元。

span.span: A comment token includes white space.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Delimiters { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 定義文字檔的分隔符號。

span.span: Defines the delimiters for a text file.

value.span: 字串陣列，其中包含 物件的所有欄位分隔符號。

span.span: A string array that contains all of the field delimiters for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是有意義才屬性設定為`FieldType.Delimited`。This property is meaningful only if the property is set to `FieldType.Delimited`. 定義分隔符號文字檔也可以使用完成方法。Defining the delimiters for a text file can also be accomplished with the method. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`Delimiters`屬性。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `Delimiters` property. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從分隔的文字檔讀取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：從逗號分隔文字檔讀取How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會指定的分隔符號`TextFieldParser`物件`FileReader`，是逗號 （，）。This example specifies that the delimiter for the `TextFieldParser` object, `FileReader`, is a comma (,). [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

exception.span: 設定為新行字元、空字串或 的分隔符號值。

span.span: A delimiter value is set to a newline character, an empty string, or .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndOfData As Boolean
public: property bool EndOfData { bool get(); };

summary.span: 如果目前的游標位置和檔案結尾之間沒有非空白的非註解行，則會傳回 。

span.span: Returns if there are no non-blank, non-comment lines between the current cursor position and the end of the file.

value.span: 如果沒有任何資料可供讀取則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if there is no more data to read; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以讀取檔案時用來判斷正在讀取資料的結尾。This property can be used when reading from files to determine the end of the data being read. 下表列出包含工作的範例`EndOfData`屬性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `EndOfData` property. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從分隔的檔案讀取Read from a delimited file|[如何：從逗號分隔文字檔讀取How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |從固定寬度的檔案讀取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：從固定寬度的文字檔讀取How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`EndofData`迴圈包含的檔案中的所有欄位的屬性`TextFieldReader`， `FileReader`。This example uses the `EndofData` property to loop through all the fields in the file with the `TextFieldReader`, `FileReader`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ErrorLine As String
public: property System::String ^ ErrorLine { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 傳回造成最新 例外狀況的行。

span.span: Returns the line that caused the most recent exception.

value.span: 行，其造成最近的 例外狀況。

span.span: The line that caused the most recent exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有擲回例外狀況，則傳回空的字串。If no exceptions have been thrown, an empty string is returned. 屬性可以用來顯示造成例外狀況的行號。The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception. 下表列出包含工作的範例`ErrorLine`屬性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ErrorLine` property. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從分隔的檔案讀取Read from a delimited file|[如何：從逗號分隔文字檔讀取How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |從固定寬度的檔案讀取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：從固定寬度的文字檔讀取How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`ErrorLine`屬性來顯示造成目前的一行例外狀況。This example uses the `ErrorLine` property to display the line causing the current exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ErrorLineNumber As Long
public: property long ErrorLineNumber { long get(); };

summary.span: 傳回造成最新 例外狀況的行號。

span.span: Returns the number of the line that caused the most recent exception.

value.span: 造成最近 例外狀況之行的號碼。

span.span: The number of the line that caused the most recent exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有擲回例外狀況，則傳回-1。If no exceptions have been thrown, -1 is returned. 屬性可以用來顯示造成例外狀況的行號。The property can be used to display the number of the line that caused the exception. 判斷的行號時，將不會忽略空白行和註解。Blank lines and comments are not ignored when determining the line number. 下表列出包含工作的範例`ErrorLineNumber`屬性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ErrorLineNumber` property. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從分隔的檔案讀取Read from a delimited file|[如何：從逗號分隔文字檔讀取How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |從固定寬度的檔案讀取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：從固定寬度的文字檔讀取How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`ErrorLineNumber`屬性來顯示導致目前的行位置例外狀況。This example uses the `ErrorLineNumber` property to display the location of the line causing the current exception. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <int> ^ FieldWidths { cli::array <int> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <int> ^ value); };

summary.span: 代表正在剖析文字檔中每一個資料行的寬度。

span.span: Denotes the width of each column in the text file being parsed.

value.span: 整數陣列，其中包含正在剖析之文字檔中每一個資料行的寬度。

span.span: An integer array that contains the width of each column in the text file that is being parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是有意義才屬性設定為`FieldType.FixedWidth`。This property is meaningful only if the property is set to `FieldType.FixedWidth`. 如果陣列中的最後一個項目是否小於或等於零，欄位會假設是變數寬度。If the last entry in the array is less than or equal to zero, the field is assumed to be of variable width. 方法也可用來設定欄位寬度。The method can also be used to set field widths. 下表列出包含工作的範例`FieldWidths`屬性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `FieldWidths` property. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從固定寬度的文字檔讀取Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：從固定寬度的文字檔讀取How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會讀取檔案`ParserText.txt`，指定的寬度; 第一個資料行是 5 個字元寬、 第二個為 10、 第三個為 11，以及第四個是變數寬度的This example reads the file `ParserText.txt`, specifying the widths; the first column is 5 characters wide, the second is 10, the third is 11, and the fourth is of variable width [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#16)]

exception.span: 任何位置 (除了陣列的最後一個項目以外) 中的寬度值會小於或等於零。

span.span: A width value in any location other than the last entry of the array is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在記憶體回收 (GC) 回收 物件前，允許其嘗試釋放資源並執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Allows the object to attempt to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 代表分隔的檔案進行剖析時，欄位是否加上引號。

span.span: Denotes whether fields are enclosed in quotation marks when a delimited file is being parsed.

value.span: 如果欄位要以引號括住則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if fields are enclosed in quotation marks; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 如果屬性是`True`，剖析器會假設欄位會括在引號 ("")，而且可能會包含行尾結束符號。If the property is `True`, the parser assumes that fields are enclosed in quotation marks (" ") and may contain line endings. 如果欄位以引號括住，例如`abc, "field2a,field2b", field3`和這個屬性是`True`，則會傳回所有以引號括住的文字，因為; 這個範例會傳回`abc|field2a,field2b|field3`。If a field is enclosed in quotation marks, for example, `abc, "field2a,field2b", field3` and this property is `True`, then all text enclosed in quotation marks will be returned as is; this example would return `abc|field2a,field2b|field3`. 此屬性設定為`False`讓此範例會傳回`abc|"field2a|field2b"|field3`。Setting this property to `False` would make this example return `abc|"field2a|field2b"|field3`. ## Examples 此範例會設定`HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes`屬性`True`如`myReader`。This example sets the `HasFieldsEnclosedInQuotes` property to `True` for `myReader`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Long
public: property long LineNumber { long get(); };

summary.span: 傳回目前的行號，如果資料流中已沒有可用的字元，則會傳回 -1。

span.span: Returns the current line number, or returns -1 if no more characters are available in the stream.
The current line number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 判斷的行號時，將不會忽略空白行和註解。Blank lines and comments are not ignored when determining the line number. ## Examples 這個範例會在文字檔案中搜尋"Jones 」 的名稱，並報告哪一行上。This example searches for the name "Jones" in the text file and reports what line(s) it occurs on. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string PeekChars(int32 numberOfChars) cil managed
Public Function PeekChars (numberOfChars As Integer) As String

span.span: Number of characters to read.
Required.

summary.span: 讀取指定數目的字元而不使游標前進。

span.span: Reads the specified number of characters without advancing the cursor.

returns.span: 字串，包含指定的已讀取字元數。

span.span: A string that contains the specified number of characters read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `numberOfChars`值必須小於列中的字元總數。The `numberOfChars` value must be less than the total number of characters in the line. 如果不是，所傳回的字串`PeekChars`會截斷成列的長度。If it is not, the string returned by `PeekChars` will be truncated to the length of the line. 空白行會遭到忽略。Blank lines are ignored. 不會傳回行結尾字元。End-of-line characters are not returned. `PeekChars`方法會執行不需要剖析; 分隔欄位中的行結尾字元會解譯為實際的行結尾。The `PeekChars` method performs no parsing; an end-of- line character within a delimited field is interpreted as the actual end of the line. 下表列出包含工作的範例`PeekChars`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `PeekChars` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |先剖析它決定欄位的格式Determine the format of a field before parsing it|[如何：以多種格式從文字檔讀取How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`PeekChars`尋找資料的結尾，並停止在該點剖析檔案。This example uses `PeekChars` to find the end of the data and stop parsing the file at that point. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

span.span: is less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string[] ReadFields() cil managed

summary.span: 讀取目前行上的所有欄位，將它們傳回為字串陣列，並將游標前進至包含資料的下一行。

span.span: Reads all fields on the current line, returns them as an array of strings, and advances the cursor to the next line containing data.

returns.span: 字串陣列，包含目前行的欄位值。

span.span: An array of strings that contains field values for the current line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓使用者剖析文字檔案，以多種格式，`ReadFields`方法會檢查的值`TextFieldType`， `Delimiters`，和`FieldWidths`，如果指定這些設定，每次呼叫時。In order to allow users to parse text files in multiple formats, the `ReadFields` method examines the values of `TextFieldType`, `Delimiters`, and `FieldWidths`, if they are specified, each time it is called. 使用者需要正確地設定`TextFieldType`和`FieldWidths`或`Delimiters`適當的屬性。Users need to correctly configure the `TextFieldType` and `FieldWidths` or `Delimiters` properties, as appropriate. 如果`TextFieldType`設`Delimited`，和`Delimiters`未設定，或如果`TextFieldType`設`FixedWidth`和`FieldWidths`，擲回例外狀況。If `TextFieldType` is set to `Delimited`, and `Delimiters` is not set, or if `TextFieldType` is set to `FixedWidth` and `FieldWidths`, an exception is thrown. 如果`ReadFields`遇到空白列，則會略過，而且會傳回下一個非空白行。If `ReadFields` encounters blank lines, they are skipped and the next non-blank line is returned. 如果`ReadFields`方法無法剖析目前這一行時，會引發例外狀況並不會移動到下一行。If the `ReadFields` method cannot parse the current line, it raises an exception and does not move to the next line. 這可讓您的應用程式嘗試剖析列一次。This enables your application to attempt to parse the line again. 下表列出包含工作的範例`ReadFields`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `ReadFields` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從分隔的檔案讀取Read from a delimited file|[如何：從逗號分隔文字檔讀取How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |從固定寬度的檔案讀取Read from a fixed-width file|[如何：從固定寬度的文字檔讀取How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會使用`ReadFields`方法從逗號分隔的檔案讀取`ParserText.txt`。This example uses the `ReadFields` method to read from the comma-delimited file `ParserText.txt`. 此範例寫入的欄位`Testfile.txt`。The example writes the fields to `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 欄位無法使用指定的格式進行剖析。

span.span: A field cannot be parsed by using the specified format.
Associated enumeration: .
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string ReadLine() cil managed

summary.span: 將目前的行以字串傳回，並將游標前進至下一行。

span.span: Returns the current line as a string and advances the cursor to the next line.

returns.span: 取自檔案或資料流的目前行。

span.span: The current line from the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReadLine`方法會執行不需要剖析; 分隔欄位中的行結尾字元會解譯為實際的行結尾。The `ReadLine` method performs no parsing; an end-of-line character within a delimited field is interpreted as the actual end of the line. `Nothing` 會傳回如果已到達檔案結尾。`Nothing` is returned if the end of the file is reached. ## Examples 這個範例會讀取整個檔案`ParserText.txt`並將它寫入`Testfile.txt`。This example reads through the file `ParserText.txt` and writes it to `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#15)] 如果`Testfile.txt`不存在，就會建立`WriteAllText`方法。If `Testfile.txt` does not exist, it is created by the `WriteAllText` method. 這個範例會寫入欄位做為單一字串。將每一行的那一行，在目的檔中，顯示`VbCrLf`應該在每一行的結尾附加字元。This example writes the fields as a single string; to have each line display on its own line in the destination file, a `VbCrLf` character should be appended at the end of each line.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance string ReadToEnd() cil managed

summary.span: 讀取文字檔的其餘部分，並將其以字串傳回。

span.span: Reads the remainder of the text file and returns it as a string.

returns.span: 取自檔案或資料流的其餘文字。

span.span: The remaining text from the file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是進階的成員;它不會顯示在 IntelliSense 中除非您按一下**所有** 索引標籤。This is an advanced member; it does not show in IntelliSense unless you click the **All** tab. 如果沒有任何多個讀取，因為已達到檔案結尾，`Nothing`傳回。If there is nothing more to read because the end of the file has been reached, `Nothing` is returned. `ReadToEnd`方法不會忽略空白行和註解。The `ReadToEnd` method does not ignore blank lines and comments. ## Examples 這個範例會使用`ReadToEnd`方法來讀取整個檔案`ParserText.txt`並將它寫入至檔案`Testfile.txt`。This example uses the `ReadToEnd` method to read the entire file `ParserText.txt` and write it to the file `Testfile.txt`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#10)] 如果`Testfile.txt`不存在，就會建立`WriteAllText`方法。If `Testfile.txt` does not exist, it is created by the `WriteAllText` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetDelimiters(string[] delimiters) cil managed
Public Sub SetDelimiters (ParamArray delimiters As String())

span.span: Array of type .

summary.span: 將讀取器 (Reader) 的分隔符號設為指定的值，並將欄位型別 (Field Type) 設為 。

span.span: Sets the delimiters for the reader to the specified values, and sets the field type to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的內容`Delimiters`設定這個方法時，會清除屬性。The existing contents of the `Delimiters` property are cleared when this method is set. 這個方法會提供設定分隔符號，而不需要建立陣列的方法。This method provides a way to set delimiters without creating an array. 下表列出的工作，包含範例`SetDelimiters`方法。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `SetDelimiters` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |剖析文字檔案Parse a text file|[使用 TextFieldParser 物件剖析文字檔Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/parsing-text-files-with-the-textfieldparser-object.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會開啟文字欄位剖析器，並定義做為分隔符號`vbTab`。This example opens a text field parser and defines the delimiter as `vbTab`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#4)] 取代路徑`C:\logs\test.log`與您想要剖析的檔案名稱與路徑。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse.

span.span: A delimiter is zero-length.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void SetFieldWidths(int32[] fieldWidths) cil managed
Public Sub SetFieldWidths (ParamArray fieldWidths As Integer())

span.span: Array of .

summary.span: 將讀取器 (Reader) 的分隔符號設定為指定的值。

span.span: Sets the delimiters for the reader to the specified values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的內容`Delimiters`設定完成後，會清除屬性。The existing contents of the `Delimiters` property are cleared when this is set. 這個方法會提供設定分隔符號，而不需要建立陣列的方法。This method provides a way to set delimiters without creating an array. 下表列出包含工作的範例`SetFieldWidths`方法。The following table lists example of tasks involving the `SetFieldWidths` method. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |剖析文字檔案。Parse a text file.|[使用 TextFieldParser 物件剖析文字檔Parsing Text Files with the TextFieldParser Object](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/parsing-text-files-with-the-textfieldparser-object.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會開啟文字欄位的剖析器，並定義為欄位寬度`5`。This example opens a text-field parser and defines the field width as `5`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#12)] 取代路徑`C:\logs\test.log`與您想要剖析的檔案名稱與路徑。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse. 下列範例會開啟文字欄位的剖析器和欄位寬度，以定義`5`， `10`，和變數。The following example opens a text-field parser and defines the field widths as `5`, `10`, and variable. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#13)] 取代路徑`C:\logs\test.log`與您想要剖析的檔案名稱與路徑。Replace the path `C:\logs\test.log` with the path and name of the file you wish to parse.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType TextFieldType { Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType get(); void set(Microsoft::VisualBasic::FileIO::FieldType value); };

summary.span: 指出剖析的檔案是分隔的檔案，還是固定寬度的檔案。

span.span: Indicates whether the file to be parsed is delimited or fixed-width.

value.span: 值，指出要剖析的檔案是分隔的檔案，還是固定寬度的檔案。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the file to be parsed is delimited or fixed-width.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值被分隔。The default value of this property is delimited. 下表列出包含工作的範例`TextFieldType`屬性。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `TextFieldType` property. |以To|請參閱See| |--------|---------| |從分隔的文字檔讀取Read from a delimited text file|[如何：從逗號分隔文字檔讀取How to: Read From Comma-Delimited Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-comma-delimited-text-files.md)| |從固定寬度的文字檔讀取Read from a fixed-width text file|[如何：從固定寬度的文字檔讀取How to: Read From Fixed-width Text Files](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-fixed-width-text-files.md)| |從以多種格式的文字檔讀取Read from a text file with multiple formats|[如何：以多種格式從文字檔讀取How to: Read From Text Files with Multiple Formats](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-read-from-text-files-with-multiple-formats.md)| ## Examples 這個範例會建立`TextFieldParser`， `FileReader`，並指定分隔。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and specifies that it is delimited. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#19)] 這個範例會建立`TextFieldParser`， `FileReader`，並指定它是固定寬度。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and specifies that it is fixed-width. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool TrimWhiteSpace { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 指出是否應當去除欄位值中前置和結尾的空白字元。

span.span: Indicates whether leading and trailing white space should be trimmed from field values.

value.span: 如果應去除欄位值的前置和結尾空白字元則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if leading and trailing white space should be trimmed from field values; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的預設值為 `True`。The default value for this property is `True`. ## Examples 這個範例會建立`TextFieldParser`， `FileReader`，並設定`TrimWhiteSpace`屬性`True`。This example creates a `TextFieldParser`, `FileReader`, and sets the `TrimWhiteSpace` property to `True`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrTextFieldParser#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrTextFieldParser/VB/Class1.vb#7)]
